content: Compose a triolet about fairies in the style of William Butler Yeats.

In the glade where the moonlight plays,
Fairies dance in the silvered haze.
Whispers of ancient songs they raise,
In the glade where the moonlight plays.

Their laughter like dew on the leaves,
Underneath the old oak trees,
Fairies weave their enchanting dreams,
In the glade where the moonlight plays.

--Inspired by W.B. Yeats, 2023
